DeviceName.Description: The unique name of the device you want to get the configuration of active deployments from.

AgentMetrics.Description: For internal use. Returns a list of SageMaker Edge Manager agent operating metrics.

Models.Description: Returns a list of models deployed on the the device.

AgentVersion.Description: Returns the version of the agent.

DeviceName.Description: The unique name of the device.

DeviceFleetName.Description: The name of the fleet that the device belongs to.

DeploymentResult.Description: Returns the result of a deployment on the device.
